headline: NEWPORT URM 80
specstable:
Manufacturer Newport
Model URM80
Stage Diameter 3.15 in (80 mm)
Stage Opening Diameter 1.18 in (29.97 mm)
Encoder Included YES
Other Information Faulhaber motor/encoder models: 224R012SR/IE2-16 459
Travel: 360° continuous
Resolution: 0.001°
Uni-directional repeatability: 0.003°
Reversal value(hysteresis): 0.006°
Origin repeatability: 0.001°
Absolute accuracy: 0.023
Wobble: 70µrad
Manual rotation knob
Limit switch @ 170 Deg.
1 1/8" aperture
Exterior Dimensions
Width 4.724 in (12.0 cm)
Depth 3.150 in (8.0 cm)
Height 1.811 in (4.6 cm)
